title: Bits to Qubits: A Beginner's Guide
description: Understand the key differences between classical bits and quantum bits, and how they operate in modern computing.
additionalInfo: Learn how qubits use superposition and entanglement, how quantum gates manipulate them, and how they differ from bits.
imageCaption: Bloch Sphere â€“ visualizing qubit superposition

title: Playful Pathways into Quantum Computing
description: Explore how quantum concepts like entanglement, superposition, and measurement are taught through engaging games.
additionalInfo: From platformers and puzzles to card games and simulations, discover how quantum mechanics can be learned through fun and interaction.
imageCaption: Gamified quantum learning with playful challenges
